title: Whats with this all of a sudden?

replies.body: Cant stop the QQtrain. QQtrain relies on having something to QQ about, that is then picked up by thousands of people with nothing better to do.
I've seen Brand top win vs Darius. It's not so bad I guess.

Just don't take mages to the top lane, they're often support or mid like {{champion:99}} and {{champion:143}}, some ap champs like {{champion:245}} can go top but complaining about mages vs meta tops is just downright Darius
